hero.title: For You, Dear Mary
hero.subtitle: Every moment with you is a treasure. This little corner of the internet is my way of showing you just how much you mean to me. ‚ù§Ô∏è

whyILoveYou.title: Why I Love You
whyILoveYou.subtitle: Just a few of the countless reasons...

smile.title: Your Smile
smile.description: The way your face shines when you smile is the sweetest thing.

kindness.title: Your Kindness
kindness.description: You have the biggest heart and always think of others. Your compassion and care make you truly special.

humor.title: Your Sense of Humor
humor.description: You make me laugh in every conversation. Every day with you is filled with joy and silly moments I cherish.

beingYou.title: Simply Being You
beingYou.description: Everything about you is perfect in my eyes. Thank you for being exactly who you are and for letting me love you.

messageGenerator.title: Messages of Love
messageGenerator.subtitle: Random reminders of how much you mean to me
messageGenerator.footer: Click to receive a new message anytime you need a reminder üíï
messages: You make every day brighter just by being in it.
Your smile is my favorite view in the whole world.
I fall in love with you more every single day.
You're the best thing that ever happened to me.
Every moment with you is a treasure I cherish.
You're not just my love, you're my best friend.
Your laugh is the most beautiful sound I know.
I love how you make ordinary moments magical.
You inspire me to be a better person every day.
Thank you that we fit perfectly and think the same way.
compliments: You're absolutely gorgeous, inside and out.
Your kindness makes the world a better place.
You have the most amazing sense of humor.
Your strength and resilience inspire me.
You're incredibly talented at everything you do.

loveLetter.title: Letter for Your Holiday
loveLetter.subtitle: Words written with love, just for you
loveLetter.footer: Made with love, just for you

content.paragraph1: For the first time I decided to really listen to your words and put time and effort into something made especially for you, instead of just choosing an expensive gift. I wanted to give you something you won't forget, something that carries a piece of me. Let this site always remind you how much I love you and that, no matter what happens, I'll be by your side.
content.paragraph2: I wish you to never stop pursuing your dreams, even when the path seems difficult or uncertain. I wish you to believe in yourself the way I believe in you, and always stay true to what you are: strong, tender, persistent and genuine. Exactly how I love you. Thank you for being with me in good moments and difficult ones. You understand me, you tolerate me and most of all you make me want to be a better person. With you I feel calmer, braver and more confident in myself.
content.paragraph3: Like every year, now too I am endlessly proud of you - of everything you are, the way you think, and how much you give of yourself to the world and to your friends and family. Continue boldly and confidently forward, because you can do it and you deserve it. And even when we're far from each other, I want you to know that you're never alone. I will always support you and I'll always be here when you need a shoulder to lean on.
